# addHoverEffect(_:)

**Instance Method**

Add an hover effect for this tracking area. No hover effect will be rendered if this isn’t called.

## Declaration

```swift
func addHoverEffect(_ effect: LayerRenderer.Drawable.TrackingArea.HoverEffect)
```
title: addHoverEffect(_:)
